title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Fixed JFrog OIDC documentation by adding `raw`/`endraw` tags to prevent Liquid template issues in YAML examples.
Updated ruleset bypass permissions to exclude secret teams and added a link to team visibility docs.
Limited Actions permissions (manage settings, runners, secrets, variables, environments) to GitHub Enterprise Cloud (GHEC) only.
summary:
- Fixed JFrog OIDC documentation by adding `raw`/`endraw` tags to prevent Liquid template issues in YAML examples.
- Updated ruleset bypass permissions to exclude secret teams and added a link to team visibility docs.
- Limited Actions permissions (manage settings, runners, secrets, variables, environments) to GitHub Enterprise Cloud (GHEC) only.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Fixed JFrog OIDC documentation by adding `raw`/`endraw` tags to prevent Liquid template issues in YAML examples.
- Updated ruleset bypass permissions to exclude secret teams and added a link to team visibility docs.
- Limited Actions permissions (manage settings, runners, secrets, variables, environments) to GitHub Enterprise Cloud (GHEC) only.

### Title
